name: Everyday I'm Chapulin', Gezi , Capulcu , #occupygezi T-shirt
description:
SIZING:
Model is wearing a size Medium
Model's Measurements:
Height: 6'0"
Weight: 180 lbs
Body Type: Slim/Athletic

This shirt is to support the protests and resistance going on over Turkey. The Penguin wearing the gas mask resembles; Penguin: The Turkish media, while CNN international was covering the protests in Turkey, CNNTurk was showing penguin documentaries. Gas mask: Use of excessive police force and gas on peaceful protestors. 15% of this purchase will go Taksim Dayanisma Platformu and Gezi park. Please follow and share the news with your friends, the world needs to know about what is happening over there.

Meaning of the word Chapuling:

Chapuling (Turkish: çapuling) is a newly coined word originating in the current protests in Turkey, coined from the Turkish Prime Minister Erdogan's use of the term "çapulcu" (roughly translated to "vandals") to describe the protestors. Pronounced "cha-pul-ju" in Turkish, çapulcu was rapidly reclaimed by the protestors, both in its original form and as the english form chapuller and additionally verbified chapuling, given the meaning of "fighting for your rights". Chapuling has been used in Turkish both in its English form and in the hybrid word (Turkish/English) form çapuling. The word quickly caught on, adopted by the demonstrators and online activists. 



For any questions, please feel free to message me.


http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=64q2GIqH7S8

http://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=chapuling


Small, Medium and Large sizes are available.
